mapper.insert: INSERT INTO java505_team3_db.reservation_tp (customer_idx, customer_name, ceo_idx, ceo_store, reservation_stat, reservation_people, reservation_contents, reservation_date, reservation_time) VALUES (#{customerIdx}, #{customerName}, #{ceoIdx}, #{ceoStore}, 1, #{reservationPeople}, #{reservationContents}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime})
mapper.select: SELECT R.ceo_store, reservation_date, reservation_time, reservation_stat FROM java505_team3_db.customer_tp U JOIN java505_team3_db.reservation_tp R ON U.customer_idx = R.customer_idx WHERE U.customer_idx = #{customerIdx} AND (R.reservation_stat = 1 OR R.reservation_stat = 2) ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time DESC

SELECT ceo_store, review_contents, review_score, review_date FROM java505_team3_db.customer_tp U JOIN java505_team3_db.review_tp V ON U.customer_idx = V.customer_idx WHERE U.customer_idx = #{customerIdx} ORDER BY review_date DESC
